alert.note: Alert for Central Mountains; Wasatch Mountains I-80 North; Wasatch Mountains South of I-80; Wasatch Plateau, Book Cliffs; Western Uinta Mountains (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 04 at 10:10PM MST until January 05 at 11:00PM MST by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 5 AM TO 11 PM MST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 6 to 12 inches, locally up to 15 inches in the upper Cottonwoods and the Mount Nebo area. * WHERE...Wasatch Mountains I-80 North, Wasatch Mountains South of I-80, Western Uinta Mountains, Wasatch Plateau/Book Cliffs and Central Mountains. * WHEN...From 5 AM to 11 PM MST Friday. * IMPACTS...Winter driving conditions can be expected on all mountain routes including Logan Summit, Sardine Summit, Parley`s Summit, Big and Little Cottonwood Canyons, Daniels Summit and SR- 31 Summit.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For graphical depictions of the snowfall forecast, including Official NWS Forecast, High End Amount, and Low End Amount, visit weather.gov/slc/winter. For winter road conditions from the Utah Department of Transportation, visit http://www.udottraffic.utah.gov.
